Uses of Class
org.smpp.Connection

  • Packages that use Connection 
    Package Description
    org.smpp  

    • Uses of Connection in org.smpp

      Subclasses of Connection in org.smpp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SSLConnection 
      class  TCPIPConnection
      Implementation of TCP/IP type of communication.
      Methods in org.smpp that return Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Connection TCPIPConnection.accept()
      Accepts new connection on server type connection, i.e. on ServerSocket.
      abstract Connection Connection.accept()
      This method should wait for connection.
      Connection Session.getConnection()
      Returns Connection object provided for communication with SMSC.
      Connection ReceivedPDUEvent.getConnection()
      Return the connection over which the pdu was received.
      Methods in org.smpp with parameters of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.receivePDUFromConnection(Connection connection, Unprocessed unprocessed)
      Elementary method receiving data from connection, trying to create PDU from them and buffering data in case the PDU isn't still complete.
      protected abstract PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      This method should try to receive one PDU from the connection.
      protected PDU Receiver.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      This method tries to receive one PDU from the connection.
      protected PDU OutbindReceiver.tryReceivePDU(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU) 
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU)
      Calls tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection,PDU,long) with timeout set by setReceiveTimeout.
      protected PDU ReceiverBase.tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection, PDU expectedPDU, long timeout)
      For specified time tries to receive a PDU from given connection by calling method tryReceivePDU.
      Constructors in org.smpp with parameters of type Connection 
      Constructor and Description
      OutbindEvent(OutbindReceiver source, Connection connection, Outbind outbindPDU)
      Construct event for outbind pdu received over conection belonging to the outbind receiver.
      OutbindReceiver(Connection serverConnection)
      Instantiate with the server connection.
      ReceivedPDUEvent(ReceiverBase source, Connection connection, PDU pdu)
      Construct event for pdu received over connection belonging to the receiver.
      Receiver(Connection connection)
      This constructor sets the connection to receive the messages from.
      Receiver(Transmitter transmitter, Connection connection)
      This constructor sets the connection to receive the messages from and a transmitter for sending generic negative acknowledges if necessary.
      ServerPDUEvent(Receiver source, Connection connection, PDU pdu)
      Creates event for provided Receiver and Connection with the received PDU.
      Session(Connection connection)
      Creates Session which uses provided Connection.
      Transmitter(Connection c)
      Creates Transmitter which uses provided Connection.
